SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES. BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck! In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age. Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now weâ€™re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile. â€¢ Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history. Cultist Simulator doesnâ€™t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time youâ€™ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees. â€¢ Intense, immersive narrative â€“ Combine cards to tell your own story. A hefty novelâ€™s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end. â€¢ A rich Lovecraftian world â€“ Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies. Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraftâ€™s tales to an entirely new setting. Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics... â€¢ The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal â€¢ The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened â€¢ The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit â€¢ The Exile - Some there are who will not yield If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on â€œContact usâ€ at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience. Some of the key features that VidHub offers include: - Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud - Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkvã€.aviã€.mp4ã€.movã€.rmvbã€.wmv, and more - High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions - The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB - Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services. - Support downloading and deleting cloud files - Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method. - Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server. - Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more. All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire. Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community. entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆä»·æ ¼ï¼š$150.00 â†’ $30.00 [$30.00 ~ $150.00]ï¼‰

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket. A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking --------------------------------------------------- Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone. Inspired by the Iconic Board Game ---------------------------------- Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada ChvÃ¡til, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon. More Content, More Fun ------------------------- While staying true to the originalâ€™s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames. Play Anytime, Anywhere ------------------------ With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges. Build Your Secret Agent Career ------------------------------- Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster! Connect and Compete with Friends ----------------------------------- Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words. Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience. Some of the key features that VidHub offers include: - Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud - Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkvã€.aviã€.mp4ã€.movã€.rmvbã€.wmv, and more - High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions - The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB - Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services. - Support downloading and deleting cloud files - Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method. - Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server. - Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more. All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire. Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community. Speech to text : Voice to text is the powerful, real-time dictation solution. Based on the latest artificial intelligence and using a powerful speech recognition engine, This Dictation app accurately transcribes your speech to text in real time. The clean elegant design, along with the non-stop voice recognition and other features means you can relax and focus on your thoughts and content. Using our app , your words will be magically transcribed into text without your ever needing to touch a keyboard. Now you can use the power of your voice to create your words! Easily share your text and files later! (Works with Evernote, Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, Facebook, Twitter, Snapchat, WhatsApp and other iOS supported sharing apps.) Whether youâ€™re a professional writer, doctor, lawyer, disabled or somehow prevented from traditional typing, Speech to text : Voice to text app will swiftly solve your transcription problems and help you achieve your writing goals today! This fantastic speech-to-text app will allow you to do more with your iPhone/ iPad : ãƒ»Longer Record time: -DICTATE CONTINUOUSLY up-to 1 HOUR. ãƒ»Unlimited save & edits ãƒ»Transcribed text can be edited directly. ãƒ»Ideal for both individual and group transcription ãƒ»Background support for voice recognition. ãƒ»On-device Speech Recognition. â€¢ Voice recognition support for 59 languages and accents. â€¢ Share your text on social networks. â€¢ Copy your text to other apps. â€¢ Send your text as an email or text message. â€¢ Create PDF instantly with single click. â€¢ Convert text your notes, reports, letters into PDF instantly â€¢ Text Analysis using AI. â–º Currently Supported Speech Recognition Languages: Arabic, Cantonese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Malay, Norwegian, BokmÃ¥l, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Shanghainese, Slovak, Spanish, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese. No need to login or register You can add new paragraphs, punctuation marks, smileys and other special characters using simple voice commands. Who Should Use Speech to Text : Voice to Text ? 1. Reporters: Interviews, conversations and more are easily recorded and transcribed, preserving the original audio. 2. Writers: Novelists, Authors, can all write in their true voice, capturing their moments of inspiration anytime, anywhere. 3. Professionals: Doctors, lawyers, managers, etc. Easily transcribe your daily tasks, notes, conference calls, letters and more! Your voice makes it happen! 4. Language Students: Text analysis using AI , Easily learn and master new words and languages by practicing dictation with speech to text app ! Race across the world through colorful and stylized environments in top-down view. Compete for first place in the leaderboards with daily and weekly challenges. Will you master the art of rally? Experience the golden era of rally in Career mode, traveling across 78 stages from Finland to Sardinia, Norway, Japan, Germany, Kenya and Indonesia. Get behind the wheel of your favorite vintage cars, ranging from the 60â€™s to the 80â€™s, Group B, Group S and Group A. From beginner-friendly options to driving modes thatâ€™ll challenge the most expert drivers, all players can tackle the races using their favorite rally driving tricks: Scandinavian flick, counter steering, left foot braking, handbrake turns. Get your name out at the top of the Leaderboard in our daily and weekly challenges. Show off your driving skills, or simply your favourite landscapes, with the integrated Photo and Replay mode.
